appetizers.name: hummus
appetizers.description: A wonderfully smooth hummus. Try it with our pita chips!

appetizers.name: pita chips
appetizers.description: Crunchy and bustling with flavor. A perfect appetizer on their own, or with JSON's hummus!

cold sandwiches.name: italian sub

hot sandwiches.description: Our famous lamb meatball sub! Toasted for 4 minutes - no more, no less.

hot sandwiches.name: curry doner kebab
hot sandwiches.description: An indian twist on the classic doner kebab.

desserts.name: lava cake
desserts.description: A wonderful lava cake. Served warm, with molten chocolate!
